games.title: Watermelon Game
games.description: Join the exciting adventure of the Watermelon Game, where you collect and merge fruits for a thrilling experience! Match similar fruits to evolve them while avoiding overflow. Can you master the game and craft the ultimate watermelon? Try this captivating challenge on your phone or computer!
games.howToPlayText: Use your mouse or touch to move the fruits. Click on the game field to drop the fruit.
